people With Start Up Issues ?

Save This As A .reg file And Run It
-----------------------------------------
REGEDIT

[-HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Eidos\Deus Ex: HR\Graphics]
-----------------------------------------------------
Or Just Navigate To 

[HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Eidos\Deus Ex: HR\Graphics]  

And Delete The Key. This Resets Your Graphics. So Next Time U Start Up. The Launcher Will Start So U Can Configure Your Ne Graphics Settings

For anyone that is still having problems loading the game at startup and having it crash, I believe I have fixed the issue.

I was having the same problem and started checking out the registry and changed one of the values, this lead me to load the game with no problems.


HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Eidos\Deus Ex: HR\Graphics

Change the DWORD "DisableHardwareShadowMaps" from "0" to "1"

I was then able to load the game with no problems.

Hope this helps

This is for Shitrow

I had the same problem starting up but I found out why. I had iz3d running in the backround, and it was trying to inject itself into the game to make it 3D, I couldn't find the process name in task manager so I uninstalled it. You guys probably don't have iz3d yourself but if you can think of any program that injects itself into the game, or messes with graphics settings or if you can think of any program having compatibility issues then I would suggest turning it off. Thats how I fixed mine. hope that helps you too.

DFEngine.dll
fmodex.dll
installscript.vdf
steam_api.dll

For anyone having troubles getting there game to work right

1. Download the game from http://tehparadox.com/forum/f43/%5Bfslfsclbslwu-%5Ddeus-ex-human-revolution%5Beng-iso-2011%5D1gb-9dls-2799367/ and extract the Rars(files are interchangeable). 2. Download the replace files: http://filesmelt.com/dl/Deus.Ex_.Human_.Revolution_.Crack-ALI213_.rar copy over and replace files in the game directory you created.

3. Download the crack: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6631263/Deus_Ex._Human_Revolution_CRACK_ONLY_V1.1622.0.rar copy over and replace the game file in the game directory you created.

Thats it, you should be ready to go, if you need any help email me at jefferson3891@hotmail.com
